Apos.​Input.​ConditionTrigger
public
Apos.​Input.​ConditionTrigger

Used to abstract conditions away.  This makes it possible to create a condition that triggers on gamepad buttons, keyboard press, or even in game events.

Constructors

public ConditionTrigger()

Empty ConditionTrigger.

List<Func<bool>> conditions

List<Func<bool>>

IsTriggered

Returns

Returns true when at least 1 condition is true.
